price: Or do they possess the treasures of your Lord, or do they have full control [of everything]?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
